alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 15 at 3:12PM CST until December 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR CRITICAL FIRE CONDITIONS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 011, 012, 025, AND 102... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 025 and 102.Fire weather zones 001, 002, 011, and 012. * WIND...Southerly winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 60 to 65 mph expected. * HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated thunderstorms are possible Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
